amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate in support of a balanced budget amendment to the Constitution.

action.text: Amendment SA 115 proposed by Senator Lee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 115, pursuant to the order of March 2, 2011, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 40. Record Vote Number: 30.
